summary: This mod will make followers stop talking constantly.
descriptionHtml:
This mod will make followers and hirelings stop their constant and repetitive idle dialogue.
As of initial release, this affects Mjoll the Lioness, as I have not used other followers much, I will start testing and adding more of them to the list, feel free to request any particular character.

Installation:
Install with NMM or just extract to the Skyrim data folder.

Changelog:
Initial release: v0.1
Mjoll


Notes:
Mjoll dialogue removed:
 - Exploring these caves feels like coming home, I missed it.
 - I really miss traveling like this, walking the breadth of Skyrim has always filled my heart with excitement.
 - I\'ve never been a sell-sword, never traded my skills for pay, I\'ve always adventured on my own terms.
 - You should have seen me at the height of my adventuring career, I was fearless, took too many risks, but that is what it was all about.
 - I remember a cut-purse tried to rob me on the road once, when I drew grimsever, I think the poor man soiled his armor.
 - I\'ve seen enough death to last 3 lifetimes, yet I never tire of a good fight, what do you make of that?
 - When I was young, I journeyed with my father on hunting expeditions into Morrowwind, the cliff racers make excellent sport.
 - I love the cold air, it\'s exhilarating, perhaps it\'s because of my nord blood, but there\'s something about it that makes me feel alive.
 - My father wanted me to follow in his footsteps as a hunter, but I set my aspirations a bit higher, he never complained, I miss him.
 - My mother was a strong woman, she\'s the one who instructed me on my sword-fighting techniques, can you imagine?
 - People say Skyrim is one of the most dangerous places in Tamriel, I think they\'re wrong, it\'s magnificent, and I\'m proud to call it home.
author: Black Bart
